review.title: “Positive”
review.pros: Pros – Small friendly company where you can get a taste for IT and gain experience. Interesting mix of clients who have a variety of needs that you can adapt your skill set to.
review.cons: Cons – It is a small company which may make growth opportunities difficult or slow. I find the work can get repetitive, but the more clients you have a hand in dealing with the less of a problem that tends to be.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The economy makes it hard, but it would be nice to see some pushes to grow to the next level.
